param.name: system.backup.mysql.mysqldump
param.spec: text description='Execute full command for mysqldump'

parameters.param:
<project default="nothing" name="BackupDatabase">
<tstamp><format property="DAY_TIME_NOW" pattern="yyyy-MM-dd_HH.mm.ss" /></tstamp>
<property name="mysqldump" value="${backup.mysql.mysqldump}"/>
<property name="db.host" value="${backup.mysql.host}"/> <property name="db.user" value="${backup.mysql.user}"/> <property name="db.pass" value="${backup.mysql.pass}"/> <property name="db.name" value="${backup.mysql.name}"/>
<property name="file.patch" value="${backup.mysql.patch}"/> <property name="file.name" value="${DAY_TIME_NOW}"/>
<target name="nothing"> <echo message="By default, it does nothing"/> </target>
<target name="runBackup"> <exec executable="${mysqldump}" output="${file.patch}/${file.name}.sql"> <arg value="--host=${db.host}"/> <arg value="--user=${db.user}"/> <arg value="--password=${db.pass}"/> <arg value="${db.name}"/> </exec>
<tar destfile="${file.patch}/${file.name}.tar.gz" compression="gzip"> <tarfileset dir="${file.patch}"> <include name="${file.name}.sql"/> </tarfileset> </tar>
<delete file="${file.patch}/${file.name}.sql"/>
<echo message="Completed"/> </target>
</project>
